Desc.entry: A baby and pre-school swim school which caters for all children aged from 3 months to 5 years. Classes are held in the daytime where parents are required to assist the children in the water. Baby classes include submersion techniques and has lots of bonding time to introduce babies to the water. Water confidence classes enjoy games and by using toys encourages children to get their face wet and be happy in the water. Also caters for children who can swim unaided and covers all aspects of stroke work.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Mon, Wed and Thurs, please contact for further details
